name: Nightmare Spiral
description:
WARNING: IT IS NOT COMPLETE AND ITS ONLY THE BOSS FIGHT 

I might not complete the game sadly due to lack of motivation :(  so this is where it will stay

FOR NOW ENJOY THIS, ALSO ITS HARD!

Story:

This is a game where you keep having the same sci-fi nightmare over and over again. How will you stop it?

_____________________________________________________

How to Play:

-A D or arrow keys to move and W to jump

-left mouse to shoot and mouse cursor to aim

-don't get hit by enemies

__________________________________________________
